bibl.title: Denver Post
Official Table of Point Values for Processed Foods

div1.head: OFFICIAL TABLE OF PONT VALUES FOR PROCESSED FOODS
No. 1–Effective March 1, 1943
Pursuant to Ration Order Number 13
div1.p: [Ed. Note: Please see page image for the Table of Point Values.]

Beginning March 1, every retail grocer must exhibit this chart of point values in his store. The OPA in Denver is printing 10,000 large copies of this chart for grocers, but that supply is not expected to take care of all grocers in this area. Therefore, Mr. Grocer, you should clip this chart from THE POST and be prepared to use it in your store in the event the OPA does not furnish you with a chart by March 1.
